App Configuration Documentation
USIC_UART_UART001App

App Documentation

The diagram shows the UI for the App.


Name URI Description
Operation Mode uart001_erwmode Selects Operation Mode. Operation mode available are
1. Full Duplex
2. Half Duplex
3. Loop Back Mode
Parity Selection uart001_erwparity Selects the parity value. Option available are
1. No Parity
2. Even Parity
3. Odd Parity
Stop bit uart001_erwstopbit Selects the number of stop bits required in ASC frame. Options available are
1. One stop bit
2. Two Stop bit
Data Bits uart001_irwdatabits This defines the data word length.
Range : 5 - 8 bits
Desired Baud Rate uart001_irwbaudrate UI to enter desired Baud Rate.
Peripheral Clock uart001_iroclock Current peripheral clock value
Real Baud rate uart001_irocalbaudrate Actual calculated baud rate
Transmit FIFO size uart001_irwtxfifosize This defines the no of FIFO entries assigned to the transmit buffer.
Receive FIFO size uart001_irwrxfifosize This defines the no of FIFO entries assigned to the receive buffer.
Transmit FIFO trigger limit uart001_irwtxfifotrigger Selects Transmit FIFO trigger threshold limit that is used to generate FIFO Standard transmit buffer event.
Note: Trigger limit should be less than FIFO size. Otherwise there can be an unpredictable behavior
Receive FIFO trigger limit uart001_irwrxfifotrigger Selects Receive FIFO trigger threshold limit that is used to generate FIFO Standard receive buffer event.
Note: Trigger limit should be less than FIFO size. Otherwise there can be an unpredictable behavior
Enable receiver noise detection interrupt uart001_erwRecvNoiseDetectInt This enables receiver noise detection interrupt generation. This interrupt indicates that the input value at the sample point of a bit and at the two time quanta before are not identical.
Enable format error interrupt uart001_erwFmtErrorInt This enables format error interrupt generation. This interrupt is generated if sampled bit value of stop bit is 0
Enable frame finished interrupt. uart001_erwFrameFinishInt This enables frame finished interrupt generation. This interrupt indicates that the receiver has completely finished a frame
Rx Pin Settings:
Input Charateristics 		uart001_erwInputChar Input charateristics of Rx Pin ( Pullup/ Pulldown)
Tx Pin Settings:
Pad Class 		uart001_erwTxPadClass Pad class of Tx Pin
Tx Pin Settings:
Pad Driver Mode 		uart001_erwPadDriverModeTx This option allows to select pad driver strength.


Note : Above UI parameters are used for UART001 table generation.
